text: James Sherman Wynn (March 12, 1942 - March 26, 2020), nicknamed "The Toy Cannon", was an American professional baseball player. He had a 15-year career with the Houston Colt .45s / Astros and four other teams. He played as a center fielder. He was born in Hamilton, Ohio. He also played for the Los Angeles Dodgers, Atlanta Braves, New York Yankees and the Milwaukee Brewers. Wynn died on March 26, 2020 in Houston, Texas at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jim Wynn at SABR (Baseball BioProject) *Baseball Evolution Hall of Fame â€“ Player Profile Category:Houston Astros players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Atlanta Braves players Category:New York Yankees players Category:Milwaukee Brewers players Category:African-American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Jimmy Wynn
